level.text: The Director may authorize or prohibit the removal or eradication of any species of submerged aquatic vegetation or combination thereof for any purpose, including facilitation of boating access, except as provided in ยง1402 of this chapter.

The Director, in approving submitted plans, may act to condition or otherwise limit approved plans. Conditions or limitations may be formulated to include, but are not limited to, the following concerns:
Protection of anadromous fish spawning areas between March 1st and July 1st of each year; and
Prescribing the timing, method and extent of removal, in general.
